text: jin logon ne inakaar kiya aur ve allaah ke maarg se rokate hain aur pratishthit masjid (kaaba) se, jise hamane sab logon ke lie aisa banaaya hai ki usamen baraabar hai vahaan ka rahanevaala aur baahar se aaya hua. aur jo vyakti us (pratishthit masjid) mein kutilata arthaat zoolm ke saath kuchh karana chaahega, use ham dukhad yaatana ka maza chakhaenge
